generated.css: body{height:100vh;width:100vw;box-sizing:border-box;display:grid;grid-template-rows:1fr 9fr;grid-template-areas:"h" "m";color:#000;background:#00c269;border:2vh solid #fff}header{grid-area:h;height:100%;width:100%}header nav{width:30%;height:100%;float:right;margin-right:5%;margin-top:1%}header nav ul{display:flex;justify-content:space-around;list-style-type:none;font-family:Consolas,Monaco,Courier New,monospace;font-size:1rem}header nav .clicked{font-weight:bolder;color:#fff}main{grid-area:m;display:grid;grid-template-columns:2fr 1fr;grid-template-areas:"t p"}main,main #text{height:100%;width:100%}main #text{grid-area:t;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-evenly;align-items:center}main #text #name h1,main #text #name h2,main #text #name p{margin:0}main #text #name h1,main #text #name h2{font-family:Helvetica,Arial,sans-serif}main #text #name h1{font-size:6rem}main #text #name p{text-align:right;color:#fff;font-weight:100}main #text #intro,main #text #name p{font-family:Consolas,Monaco,Courier New,monospace}main #text #intro{width:45%;color:#000}main #text #intro a{color:#005bc2;font-weight:bolder}main #pic{grid-area:p;height:100%;display:flex;align-items:flex-end}main #pic,main #pic img{width:100%}
